t: Building Lambda functions with Go - AWS Lambda
s: Go is implemented differently than other managed runtimes. Because Go compiles natively to an executable binary, it doesn't require a dedicated language runtime. Use an OS-only runtime (the provided runtime family) to deploy Go functions to Lambda.
